Wayde Stephens
VP of Sales - The Mead Group - ColoCenters - Nexis Response
November 18, 2011, Wayde reported directly to Tim

The Fleetronix success starts with the leadership of the organization.  Tim and Stacy Wales’  leadership, drive and commitment is exemplary and truly sets the bar for all the employees to follow. Their resourcefulness, energy and vision, combined with their dogged determination for success, is contagious and guides the performance of the entire company.  Tim is an exceptional visionary from a market direction and technical standpoint and has an uncanny ability to interact with customers on not only a technical but personal level to help solve business challenges. His ability to decipher the needs of the customer technically, combined with his aptitude to understand what the sales team needs to be successful, are key ingredients to why Fleetronix as an organization has flourished and will continue to do so.  Stacey’s attention to details in operations, product marketing/management and training expertise keeps the company pointed in the right direction and truly separates them from the competition on a very large scale.  I strongly recommend Fleetronix without hesitation.

summary: Creating Valuable Connections for Mutual SuccessTim Wales is an inspiring leader who leverages his passion and experience to propel others to success. A true visionary and exciting entrepreneur, Tim has a proven talent for technology ingenuity. Fueled by his entrepreneurial spirit, as the CEO and Co-founder of his latest endeavor, Kadima.Ventures, LLC, Tim is laser-focused on helping emerging companies in a collaborative setting, while also designing and building custom enterprise business solutions. Among his recent ventures is the co-founding of WebProctor, Inc., which provides an identity SaaS security solution that is rapidly gaining traction.As a U.S. Marine Corps veteran, Tim leads the charge to overcome real challenges and understands the critical role a driven and accountable team dynamic plays in accomplishing and exceeding its goals. Whether it's aiding early-stage technology companies to get to the next level, or revolutionizing the way they are funded, Tim never stops thinking forward, working tirelessly to expand his connections and challenge his already impressive achievements.
name: Tim Wales
title: CEO & Co-Founder at Kadima.Ventures
